issue.title: Simbody crashes when attempting to use PID

content.raw: Are you using a plugin to implement your controller or sending gazebo transport messages? Can you attach code that uses this mechanism? It doesn't have to include your true controller; it can just output zeroes, but it would be really helpful to have some code to reproduce this.
content.html: Are you using a plugin to implement your controller or sending gazebo transport messages? Can you attach code that uses this mechanism? It doesn't have to include your true controller; it can just output zeroes, but it would be really helpful to have some code to reproduce this.
